content.text: What is the stiffness matrix for this part of the groove structure?

The highlighted area indicates a corner of the groove structure. Uniform low stiffness is recommended in all directions to avoid excessive force.

### Stiffness Matrix
```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [100, 0, 0],
    [0, 100, 0],
    [0, 0, 100]
  ]
}
```
